solution_line_template: Monty needs to feed {num_family_members} family members and each chicken/meal combo feeds {people_per_combo} people so he needs {num_family_members}/{people_per_combo} = <<{num_family_members}/{people_per_combo}={num_combos}>>{num_combos} combos

Each chicken/meal combo costs ${cost_per_combo} and he needs {num_combos} so it will cost him {cost_per_combo}*{num_combos} = $<<{cost_per_combo}*{num_combos}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} to feed everyone
